content: NHS Digital are looking to grow their interoperability team. If you want to be part of our team building national scale FHIR solutions you might want to take a look here https://www.jobs.nhs.uk/xi/vacancy/bef7d15e0259a40ba83992e12c0b49a8/?vac_ref=914590362 or https://www.jobs.nhs.uk/xi/vacancy/bef7d15e0259a40ba83992e12c0b49a8/?vac_ref=914590455
